title: Classic Mornay Sauce
directions: In a medium saucepan melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the flour and cook, stirring constantly, until the roux is pale yellow and frothy, about 1 minute. Do not allow the roux to brown. Slowly whisk in the milk and continue to whisk until the sauce thickens and comes to a boil, about 2 to 3 minutes. Reduce the heat to a simmer and season with the salt and pepper. Allow to simmer for 2 to 3 minutes. If the sauce seems to thick, thin with a little milk.
ingredients: 10 ounces grated cheese, such Karst Cheddar
